thread.title: Kardashian's daughter Penelope wears lip ring
thread.title_full: Kourtney Kardashian's daughter Penelope wears lip ring | Daily Mail Online

author: Dailymail.com Reporter
title: Kardashian's daughter Penelope wears lip ring
text:
Kourtney Kardashian missed out on the Oscar parties to spend some time with her little ones at home on Sunday.
The 37-year-old reality TV star posted a photo on Instagram of her snuggled up with her daughter Penelope.
However, the most noticeable thing about the image was the fact that her four-year-old daughter was wearing a lip ring.
Family night: Kourtney Kardashian posted a photo on Instagram of her snuggled up with Penelope who was wearing a lip ring
The ring was from Kim Kardashian
Kourtney captioned the photo: 'Our Oscar Sunday. Yes, that's a lip ring. Thanks @kimkardashian.'
In the image the Keeping Up With The Kardashian's star, who also has children Mason, aged seven, and Reign, aged two, showed off her make-up free face.
She donned a white bathrobe as she tied her raven tresses into a messy bun.
Penelope, who's father is Scott Disick, can be seen sweetly sleeping next to her mother as she rests her head on her shoulder.
She has the lip ring on and it seems to big for her.
What a nice auntie! Kim, 36, has been wearing a lip ring lately. Pictured January
Doting mama: Kourtney has three children, Mason, aged seven, Penelope, aged four, and Reign, aged two
Pick up a printed biker like Kourtney in Alice + Olivia £1150 Alice + Olivia painted leather jacket
Shop it here at Farfetch
Buy now
Kourtney Kardashian headed out with her little girl Penelope this weekend working the a laid-back sporty vibe everyone is digging right now.
The mum of three worked a pair of gym tights paired with a khaki cropped hoodie and a cropped biker jacket for the one-on-one time with her daughter. She added Yeezy trainers and cool shades to finish things off A-list style.
Everyone loves the athlesuire trend and Kourtney rocked it perfectly here, giving it a cool edge with the help of that statement outerwear. The painted, graffiti-covered pick is by Alice + Olivia and if you're keen to bag it you're in luck as it's up for grabs at Farfetch (right).

The TV personality gave her 53.6m followers a little glimpse into their intimate Sunday evening.
Meanwhile, the mother-of-three recently re-fueled rumours of a romance with Justin Bieber.
The two spent Saturday night together at Hollywood hotspot Peppermint Club.
The two met up after Kourtney partied the night away at Jessica Alba’s husband Cash Warren’s birthday celebration.
Hot topic: Meanwhile, the mother-of-three recently re-fueled rumours of a romance with Justin Bieber
The late-night rendezvous continued into the night as they ended up at Delilah Restaurant until 2am.
A source told People the 37-year-old and 22-year-old: 'hung out together with friends, but didn’t spend the night together.
'Kourtney is still serious about making things work with Scott. She went to the birthday party for Cash first and was ready to party more after.
'They chatted, had fun but that was it. Kourtney is finished hooking up with Justin.'
Cheeky: Kourtney and Justin have both shared photos on Instagram of them together but the pair actually spent Saturday night together at Hollywood hotspot Peppermint Club
